a:title.a:text: Click the (-) icon to hide the contents

b:label.text: You can put text, HTML or widgets here.

s:info.s:widgetInfo: The CollapsePanel widget is a kind of TitlePanel that can collapse or expand its body section. It is very useful to organize the screen and save space. Like a TitlePanel, you can put text, HTML or widgets in both the body and header sections of the panel.
s:info.s:exampleInfo: if you click the '-' icon, the contents of the panel will be hidden. Clicking the '+' icon, the contents are shown again. Looking at the example's source, you can see that we handle the collapsing and expanding events, in order to change the text being shown in the title.
